HSP_ACCOUNT_3.name: HSP_ACCOUNT_3
HSP_ACCOUNT_3.description: This table contains hospital account information from the Hospital Accounts Receivable (HAR) master file. This third hospital account table has the same basic structure as HSP_ACCOUNT and HSP_ACCOUNT_2, but was created as a third table to prevent the other tables from getting any larger. This table will exclude professional billing hospital account records created by visit filing order in non-single billing office service areas.

columns.name: HSP_ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital account.

columns.name: ADMIT_TYPE_EPT_C_NAME
columns.description: Admit type as stored on patient record.

columns.name: PAT_STS_EPT_C_NAME
columns.description: Patient Status as stored on patient record.

columns.name: HAS_OPEN_OVRP_BD_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the hospital account has open overpayment records.

columns.name: SELF_PAY_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether this hospital account is self-pay.

columns.name: ACTUAL_COPAY_AMT
columns.description: For all insurance buckets of the last coverage in the filing order, the total copay specified by insurance on payments.

columns.name: ACTUAL_COINS_AMT
columns.description: For all insurance buckets of the last coverage in the filing order, the total coinsurance specified by insurance on payments.

columns.name: ACTUAL_DED_AMT
columns.description: For all insurance buckets of the last coverage in the filing order, the total deductible specified by insurance on payments.

HSP_ACCOUNT_3.PAT_STS_EPT_C_NAME: Home - Discharge to Home or Self Care
